name: Pathfinder.
technologies: Angular 16, Typescript, HTML, CSS, Unsplash API
description: Travel Blog application for demonstrating tools which increase Angular performance
myWork: Created Pathfinder travel blog from scratch. This application was created as demo application for demonstrating tools and techniques for optimizing and increasing Angular performance. In this app I covered most up-to-date information about SSR (Server-Side Rendering) hydration as well as NgOptimizingImage for optimization of image rendering and responsiveness. Also, I implement virtual scrolling from rx-anduglar library. For data source, I use UnsplashAPI to fetch images which are essential for demonstrating new Angular tool NgOptimizer, as well as loading a lot of data since app is fetching very large images.
